title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
created_time: July 05, 2022, 01:35:29 PMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:56:18 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
content: This post should have been made some weeks back, But I didn't find time to, i am glad i finally did it.Ive read from this forum, and even from other sources how people purchase items with payment in Bitcoin, some even claimed to have paid for services like medical bills, school fees, travel documents in Bitcoin, I always wondered how this users get this service providers to accept their payment in Bitcoin even when some of this businesses have not openly or publicly announced that they are accepting Bitcoin payments.Some weeks back, i.e., in the month of June, I got tired of spending money always on public transportation and decided I will buy a new motor bike to move around with, i managed to get the required amount in fiat which is about $650, i had this money on my bank account and called on 2 of my friends to accompany me to a nearby motor bike dealer.After discussing and reaching agreement with the dealer, I opted to transfer the agreed amount to the dealers bank account since I don't have fiat cash on me, the dealer wrote down his bank account details and handed it over to me to make the transfer to, I then logged in to my mobile banking app and tried to transfer but I discovered I couldn't, I tried several times but couldn't, I told the dealer and he showed me a nearby bank and asked me to go and withdraw the money, it was a lot of money to withdraw from an ATM, but I still decided to give that a try since i can not transfer, i got to the ATM and discovered I cannot withdraw too, something was definitely wrong with my bank account but why today ?I got really furious and contacted my bank's customer support through a phone call, after about 15 minutes of waiting, I was connected to a lady, i told her my issue and she said to give her some time to check my account, after about a minute, she began apologizing and asked me to be patient , that the issue with my account will be resolved within 24 hours , "24 HOURS !:o? i shouted, I have an urgent transaction to make right now, how can you tell me to wait 24 hours from now?" She then sad "Sir, we are sorry for the inconvenience, please look for another means of carrying out your transactions for the day till issue with your account is resolved", I got really angry and hang up the call.I asked the dealer, "what are going to do now?, dealer said maybe I should go and come back tomorrow after issue with my account is sorted by the bank, i cannot afford to go and come back tomorrow because I have an important appointment all through the day, infact, that day was the only spare day i have for that week, if I don't buy this bike today, it means I will have to wait till next week and I cant afford to wait that long, just as i was thinking.....I looked up and saw a local Bitcoin P2P exchange opposite the dealers shop, then I went straight to the dealer and asked him, "Do you, or rather, will you accept payment for the bike in Bitcoin?", First, he hesitated, and then asked me, " are you into Bitcoin?" i said "yes, what about you?" he said he used to hold some small amount of Bitcoins but sold it and yet to buy again, i then told him, " maybe this is a good opportunity to hold Bitcoin again", after keeping silent for some seconds, he said "Ok, lets do it.He provided his Bitcoin address, I didn't have Bitcoins worth the amount needed on my personal wallet, I logged into my binance trading account where I was sure I had up to the required amount of Bitcoins needed, i him Bitcoins worth $650, ( though the agreed price was slightly below that), transaction got confirmed in about 5 minutes, he was extremely happy even more than I expected, he wrote the receipt, he signed, I also signed, he handed us the receipt and asked to be my friend on Facebook, i said ok so we exchanged Facebook contact, he handed us the key to my new bike and thanked us so much, he was really excited that I began to wonder the reason for his over joy, then, just as i was shifting the gear of my new bike to zoom off, my mind shifted too, and I realized I just helped a fallen Bitcoiner get back on his feet again, then, I understood his excitements and why he asked to be my friend on Facebook.Then, ZOOOOM, ZOOOOM ZOOOOM......ZOOOOOOOOOOOO I fired away with this thought in my mind --->"my bank failed me, but Bitcoin came to my rescue"
